mapper.select: SELECT BT_ID , AUTHOR_ID , AUTHOR_DEPT , APPROVER_ID , RECEIVER_ID , TRAVELER_ID , TITLE , LOCATION , TRIP_START_DATE , TRIP_END_DATE , TRANSPORTATION_TYPE , TRIP_PURPOSE , FILENAME , APPROVAL_STATE , CREATED_AT FROM BUSINESSTRIP WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}

SELECT BT_ID , LOCATION , AUTHOR_ID , TRAVELER_ID , TRIP_START_DATE , TRIP_END_DATE FROM BUSINESSTRIP WHERE 1=1
AND TRAVELER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND TRIP_START_DATE <= CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}) AND TRIP_END_DATE >= CONCAT(#{searchKeyword})
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT BT_ROLE_ID , BT_ID , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_DEPT , USER_POSITION , USER_TYPE FROM BUSINESSTRIP_ROLES WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}
SELECT BT_EXP_ID , EXPENSE_ID , BT_ID , EXPENSE_TYPE , EXPENSE_DETAIL , PAYMENT_METHOD , PRICE FROM BUSINESSTRIP_EXPENSES WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BUSINESSTRIP WHERE 1=1
AND TRAVELER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND TRIP_START_DATE <= CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}) AND TRIP_END_DATE >= CONCAT(#{searchKeyword})

SELECT USER.USER_ID , USER.USER_NAME , USER.USER_DEPT , USER.USER_RANK , POS.POS_NAME , DEP.DEP_NAME FROM SDH_USER AS USER
LEFT JOIN DEP ON USER.USER_DEPT = DEP.DEP_CODE
LEFT JOIN POS ON USER.USER_RANK = POS.POS_CODE
WHERE 1=1
AND USER.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND DEP.DEP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS.POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY USER.USER_NUM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(USER.USER_ID) totcnt FROM SDH_USER AS USER LEFT JOIN DEP ON USER.USER_DEPT = DEP.DEP_CODE LEFT JOIN POS ON USER.USER_RANK = POS.POS_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND USER.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND DEP.DEP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS.POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
